pageProduct.name: QV Flare Up Wash 150Ml Eczema Prone
pageProduct.description:
General Information

QV Flare Up Wash works to relieve atopic eczema by gently cleansing the skin and removing bacteria that can aggravate eczema.Fragrance free.Non-drying.Removes bacteria.Foaming.pH balanced.Dermatologically tested.Soap free.

Warnings

Do not use on wounds.  For external use only.  Avoid eyes.  If irritation occurs, wash affected areas and discontinue use.  Keep out of reach of children.  Do not use if you are sensitive to any of the ingredients.

Common Uses

Relieves atopic eczema.

Ingredients

Aqua (water), glycerin, cetriminium bromide, benzalkonium chloride, disodium EDTA, lactic acid.

Directions

Use daily in the shower, bath or basin. Massage onto your wet skin, rinse and pat dry
